div.p:
Google.org is committing $50 million to the global COVID-19 response.
Learn More about additional COVID-19 response efforts from Google.
Part of that $50 million pledge is $5M in matching donations to the UN Foundationâ€™s COVID-19 Solidarity Response Fund for the World Health Organization.
Weâ€™ll match $2 for every $1 you donate.
100% of your donation goes to the UN Foundation for the WHO
